root.message: The REC_USE_LIM field for indicator 8-10-2, translated into en
root.data:
## Comments and limitations
World Bankâ€™s Global Findex database is based on individual level surveys worldwide, conducted every three years. The first round of the survey was done in 2011, and the second in 2014. The third round will be done in 2017. The database covers about 140 countries.
